frontMatter.title: Product Market Fit Validation
frontMatter.metaDescription: Makes sure that your product is well tuned to solve the problem specifically for the identified target market.

checklist.question: How did you identify the target customers for your product/service?
checklist.expectation: We need to follow the four steps of the product market fit i.e. Discover, Test, Position and Verify

checklist.question: What are the measurements of Product Market Fit for your product/service?
checklist.expectation: We can make use of indicators such as Product Usage Interval, Net Promoter Score, Retention Curve, Growth Rate etc...
